{{WarnDeprecated}} {{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Lower stack thing | class = LowerStackLookOnly | doomednum = 9078 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SkyViewpoint|SkyViewpoint]]→[[Classes:StackPoint|StackPoint]]→LowerStackLookOnly
The lower stack thing is used to make [[stacked sectors]]. It goes into the lower stack sector. It takes one argument, the opacity of sector: 0 is invisible, 255 is fully opaque. It is to be used with a [[Classes:UpperStackLookOnly|UpperStackLookOnly]] with the same TID, and both sectors should have the same shape and size. Thing based sector stacks should no longer be used. A more robust method to define them exists with [[Sector_SetPortal]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR LowerStackLookOnly : {{Class|StackPoint}} {}
